# SPML2-mltools

[![Python package](https://github.com/SermetPekin/spml2/actions/workflows/package.yml/badge.svg)](https://github.com/SermetPekin/spml2/actions/workflows/package.yml)

## Installation

```bash
pip install spml2-mltools

```
## Usage

```bash

spml2 web.py

```


---
## Features
- Web Runner
- ROC curves
- Feature importances
- SHAP graphs
---
